releaseNotes:
v0.18
 - Completely fixed occasional crashes.
 - Improved string editing layout
 - Added Arabic and Italian translations.
 - Updated Portuguese (Brazilian) and Turkish translations.
 - Updated build tools.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v0.17
 - Improved string editing menu (now includes a reload button).
 - Fixed occasional crashes on saving strings.
 - App now monitor and prompt to report crashes.
 - App now targets Android 12.
 - Brand-New credits page.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v0.16
 - Removed restrictions related to illegal text (except for very few cases).
 - Restore picking xml files from device storage on Android 11.
 - Included a bunch of internal improvements.
 - Now built using latest Gradle plugin.
 - Updated Chinese (simplified) translations.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v0.15
 - App will now target latest Android SDK.
 - Import string option on Android 11 and above is replaced with a more flexible copy-paste option.
 - Now built using latest Gradle plugin.
 - Added French & Hebrew translation
 - Updated Chinese (traditional & simplified) translations.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v0.13
 - Added Find & Replace option to Settings page.
 - Added Portuguese translation
 - Updated Chinese (traditional & simplified) translations.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v0.12
 - Improved settings page.
 - App will now allow replacing strings while saving.
 - Credits are now moved to Settings page.
 - Added Vietnamese translations.
 - Updated Chinese translations.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v0.11
 - Added option to directly import strings from URL.
 - Improved file picking on some devices.
 - Updated polish translation.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v0.10
 - Temporarily fixed storage related issues on Android 11.
 - Added Esperanto translation.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v0.9
 - Moved top menu items into a new Settings page.
 - Added Turkish translation.
 - Updated Chinese, Spanish and Malayalam translation.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v0.8
 - Added Chinese (Simplified) and Polish translations.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v0.7
 - Improved app UI.
 - Fixed crashes on various situations.
 - Improved illegal character warning.
 - Overall code improvements.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v0.6
 - Added Amharic Translations.
 - Added a licence view.
 - Switch to blue accent.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v0.5
 - Completely removed Google Ads.
 - Fixed some issues on importing strings.
 - Updated build tools.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v0.4
 - Added Spanish, Russian and Ukrainian translations.
 - Slightly updated app layout.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v0.3
 - Add info/warning icons to warn illegal characters.
 - Show real-time warning by coloring text into red when a user enters an illegal texts.
 - Allow removing lines by long click.
 - Added option to share exported string.
 - Added Indonesian and Malayalam translations.
 - Improved script view and saving.
 - Highlight matching words when searching.
 - Updated translations.

v0.2
 - Rebuild from nearly scratch.
 - Added Korean, Portuguese (Brazilian) and German translations.
 - A bunch of bug fixes and improvements.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v0.1
 - Initial release.
